name: Krishi Gram Vikas Kendra
briefDescription: KGVK, (Registered Under Societies Act XX1 of 1860) which is working towards integrated sustainable development in rural areas of Jharkhand through convergent efforts of the Government, Corporate bodies, NGOs, scientific Institutes and beneficiaries since 1972.KGVK is presently working towards integrated progress and prosperity in rural Jharkhand through convergent efforts of the government, corporate bodies, NGOs, scientific institutions and beneficiaries. This convergence is the P4 Principle of Public-Private-Peopleâ€™s Partnership- the key to holistic development and enabling people to fulfill their potential, helping them to help themselves. It is trying to bring the benefits of a better world to a community forsaken by the fruits of progress.
